name: segment_and_quantify_cells_in_multiplexed_images
description: Segment cells and quantify protein expression levels from multichannel tissue images.

setup_commands: git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni.git /tmp/biomni && cd /tmp/biomni && pip install -e . && rm -rf .git

inputs.description: Marker names for each image channel (as JSON array)

output.description: Research log summarizing analysis steps and output file locations
